meanings.sent1: She distributed the candies equally among her friends.
meanings.sent2: The twins were equally excited about their birthday party.
meanings.sent3: The race was so close that the competitors finished equally.
meanings.sent4: Their friendship was equally strong, like a sturdy bridge.
meanings.sent5: The scales tipped equally, showing perfect balance.

meanings.definition: To the same degree or extent
meanings.sent1: He wanted to equally share the workload with his team.
meanings.sent2: The chef decided to equally divide the pizza into eight slices.
meanings.sent3: The magician equally amazed the audience with his tricks.
meanings.sent4: Her love for both pets equally filled her heart.
meanings.sent5: The sun equally warmed the entire garden, spreading its rays.
